Description: Wall sherd of Attic black-glazed pottery closed vase; vertical ribbing on wall. Glazed black exterior; interior reserved.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Akademisches Kunstmuseum. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Compare Rotroff, Agora XXIX, no. 477 pl. 47 (250 BC – 225 BC).
Bibliographic references: Piekarski 2001 / Die Keramik aus Naukratis im Akademischen Kunstmuseum Bonn (p. 50, no. D27, pl. 24.3)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (ID.043)
